81.heading: Collection Eldorado.
81.title: Le Lama Blanc. t. 1
81.author: Georges Bess, Jodorowsky.
notes: SUMMARY: The old Grand Lama dies after explaining his plans for reincarnation. The interim lama sends demon-assassins to kill the baby, and sets up another child as successor, but unbeknownst to them another child was born the same night in the same village, and survives. 1. French comics. 2. Tibet
Comic books, strips, etc. I. Bess, Georges. II. Jodorowsky, Alexandro. III. Series. IV. Les Humanoïdes Associés. k. Lamas. k. Reincarnation. k. Demon-Assassins. k. Babies. Call no.: PN6747.B45L3 1988
